Comments:
Greetings my friend. My name is Valas and I would beg a favor from you, one that I would be more than happy to return at some later date should the need arise. I seek Allerleirauh. I consider her a good and true friend, but have lost contact with her. I h ve tried all manner of communication at my disposal to locate her, to no avail. I beg of you to send word as soon as you can. Again, my thanks.

06/16/99 22:49:32
Name: Nurgael My URL: Visit Me My Email: Email Me
Race: Teir'Dal Class: Necromancer Patron Deity: Innoruuk
Realm (server): Solsek Ro

Comments:
Wonderful site. I wonder if you might consider reviewing a tome of the dark elf necromancers and possibly adding mention of it to your bibliography. It is entitled the Lak D'Lal ("The Time of Ends") and represents apocalyptic visions of an unknown disciple of Innoruuk. It was unearthed in Neriak over a century ago and has been a closely guarded possession of the necromancer guild. Most Teir'Dal necromancers know portions of it -- must commit sections to memory, in fact -- but only inner circle necromancers are privy to the full extent of it. It would be wonderful if we might claim that the clerics recognize it as more than apocryphal. Please respond. If you are willing, I will forward a URL with excerpts and information about the book. Nurgael Order of the Crimson Hands (Solusek Ro)

Name: Anne My URL: Visit Me My Email: Email Me
Race: High Elf Class: Cleric Patron Deity: Tunare
Home City (IC): Felwithe Realm (server): Mithaniel Marr

Comments:
A poem, with more at http://www.foreverquest.com/ soon (do enquire from there if you can't find anything). This poem is a courtesy call. ~The Knight Of A Rose~ Written by Anne verdandi@rocketmail.com Someone sweeps me off my feet, Not just a person, but a romantic ideal, My knight in shining armor, His words warm and calm me in darkness. A knight is always virtuous, Acting with courtesy, honesty and valor, He conducts himself with honor, Acts productive, generous and with humility. But my paramount knight of the world, Is a leader of knights, Fearless like a wyrm, Humble like a saint. He is a great dragon, His name even fits the description, Because he is my one and only, Knight of a rose. All rights reserved. Hope to see you around. ^_^
